#The ages of the oldest open clusters
#
#Determined by Salaris M., Weiss A., S.M. Percival 2004, Astron. Astrophys. 414, 163 (2004A&A...414..163S)
# 
#The column are :
#
#Cluster name
#Value of the delta(V) morphogical parameter and its associated error
#Metallicity and error 
#Age in [Gyr] and error
#log age
#Galactocentric distance in [kpc]
#Height to the Galactic plane [pc]
#
#
